title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownies that are perfect for dessert or a sweet treat.
